questions.question: How many times do Muslims have to perform Hajj in their lifetime?
questions.correctAnswer: Once in their lifetime, if they are physically and financially able
questions.explanation: Pilgrimage is viewed as a particularly meritorious activity.

answers.title: Once in their lifetime, if they are physically and financially able

questions.question: How long do Muslims fast every day during the month of Ramadhan?
questions.correctAnswer: Muslims fast from dawn to sunset
questions.explanation: Sawm (fasting) begins with dawn and ends with sunset.
